mapper.select: select a.`code`, a.`client_id`, a.`name`, a.`ability_id`,a.`cron`, a.`command`, a.`status`,a.`execute_time` as executeTime, a.`create_time`, a.`update_time`, b.`gateway_id`,b.`name` as clientName,b.`last_link_time`,b.`product_id` as productId, c.`name` as gatewayName,c.`address` from iot_appointment a left join iot_client b on a.`client_id` = b.`id` left join iot_gateway c on b.`gateway_id` = c.`id` where a.`code` = #{code} limit 1
mapper.insert: insert into iot_appointment(code,client_id, name, ability_id, cron,command, create_time) values (#{code},#{clientId}, #{name}, #{abilityId}, #{cron},#{command}, now())
